speaker: cactusboi
dialog: Looks like you've been stressin' about some things!

speaker: cactusboi
dialog: I know you said some stuff to your friend that came across wrong; it's alright, it happens.

speaker: cactusboi
dialog: You can’t blame yourself for how they understood your words, that’s on their end.

speaker: cactusboi
dialog: Now, we gotta rid you of all this negative energy. I say, just say ''sorry.''

speaker: cactusboi
dialog: The sooner you get it over with the better you will both feel. No use in talking about it even more.

speaker: cactusboi
dialog: They made their point, you made yours. For the sake of your friendship just move on and let it go.
